Question: The Lakers finished the season on a ten game losing streak, and this person's final record as a head coach was 5-11.
Hints: This person had another productive season with averages of 19.6 points, 11.9 assists, and 6.2 rebounds per game.
To prevent his HIV infection from progressing to AIDS, this person takes a daily combination of drugs.
On November 1, 2002 this person returned to play a second exhibition game against Michigan State.
